commands.name: az network private-dns record-set soa show
commands.summary: Get the details of an SOA record.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set soa show [--ids]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set soa show -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set soa update
commands.summary: Update properties of an SOA record.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set soa update --resource-group
                                             --zone-name
                                             [--email]
                                             [--expire-time]
                                             [--host]
                                             [--minimum-ttl]
                                             [--refresh-time]
                                             [--retry-time]
                                             [--serial-number]
examples:
az network private-dns record-set soa update -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -e myhostmaster.mysite.com
